newsitem.title: USA: Universal American downsizes NY operation.
newsitem.headline: Universal American downsizes NY operation.

text.p: Universal American Financial Corp said on Tuesday it is restructuring its operations, shifting some operations to Pensacola, Fla., and shedding a net 30 employees in New York.

Universal said that by July 1997 it will move most of the administrative functions for its senior market life and accident and health business to the new Pensacola facility. The company estimated its annual savings from this restructuring at $1 million.
Universial said it took a $250,000 charge in the fourth quarter of 1996 to cover the costs of this restructuring.
